name: Doppelpass
description:
This soccer management bundle contains Anstoss AKA On the Ball and the self-running add-on Anstoss World Cup Edition

In Anstoss you’re the manager of your favorite German soccer team. You start always in the first division and the game end with the descent of your team. Anstoss shows you the matches like a TV show. The highlights were shown in 3D graphics and the rest in text phrases. The CD version had audio commentary.

In Anstoss WCE you’re the team manager of a country. You have to take the qualification to the World Championship. The training is more important in this setting. The presentation is like Anstoss. You have to give interviews before important matches and after great victories or poor losses.

Both games don’t use real names – but have a great editor.
